revised_title: Kolmogorov's Ideas on Turbulence and Stochastic Processes
tldr: This article discusses the lasting influence of Kolmogorov's 1958 seminar on dynamical systems and hydrodynamic instability. It explores his ideas on turbulence, the transition from laminar to turbulent flows, and the predictability of turbulent chaos. The article also highlights the challenges in distinguishing between quasi-periodic systems and genuinely chaotic systems, and the unsolved problems related to the study of turbulence and stochastic processes.
